description: This file defines an interface class 'IOmiProxy' for interacting with an omi_dbus_api, providing methods to mount/unmount crypted bundles and manage error listeners. It is part of a larger system related to OCI container management, likely used in a cloud or embedded environment.

classes.name: IOmiProxy
classes.description: An interface class providing methods for mounting crypted bundles, error handling, and listener management within the omi namespace.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted OCI container bundle given its identifiers and paths, returning the path to the decrypted config json.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted OCI container bundle identified by its ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers a listener for omi error events and returns a listener handle.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered omi error listener using its handle.

calls: virtual bool mountCryptedBundle(const std::string&, const std::string&, const std::string&, std::string&)
virtual long unsigned registerListener(const OmiErrorListener &, const void*)

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
